title: Claude Sonnet 3.5 AI: A New King Over ChatGPT?
description:
Well the last week has been a big one, personally, professionally and in the world of AI, so lets get into it. Les discuss the launch of the new Claude Sonnet 3.5! Talking about how it outperforms ChatGPT in various benchmarks, making it a formidable contender in the AI space. As well as discussing all other things AI, including what I have been up to in the space and new YouTuber tools!

Check them out: https://www.scoremydeck.com/ & https://engineeringgenerosity.com

Presale for YouTube toolkit based on https://www.youtube.com/@UCUoSr3dQcE_MWlRY1WZmCZA interviews: https://buy.stripe.com/bIY8yh1rn9Cgd5m148

Presale for Somatic Check-in Writing app: https://buy.stripe.com/dR69Cl8TPbKo1mE149
